features: Powerful, convenient, and easy to use
Powerful suction makes it great for quick pick ups with multipurpose versatility, Cleans up dirt and debris on carpets, area rugs and hard floors.
Versatile cleaning three machines in one: a stick vacuum, handle vacuum, and stair vacuum
With a crevice tool for furniture and a floor nozzle for stairs
Clean hard floors and surface dirt on carpets and area rugs. Surface Type: Counter Tops, Sealed Hard Floors, Low Pile Carpet. Dirt Cup Capacity: 0. 67 liter
body.description: The Featherweight lightweight stick vacuum gives you convenient and effective cleaning on carpets, area rugs, bare floors, stairs, upholstery and more! it easily converts from a stick vacuum to a hand vacuum to clean anywhere in your home. Because the Featherweight is ultra-lightweight and compact it is easy to use and easy to store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little lightweight vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This little thing is awesome, as long as you know what you are buying! I'm pleasantly surprised at how good it works for the price and how very, very easy it is to use. It's so light I can lift it with one finger.It does not have a roller or brush nor a hose. It's basically a very nice handheld vacuum unit that also has a detachable long handle and floor attachment, plus a crevice or edge cleaning tool. It's great for hard floors and seems to work on low pile carpet or rugs. As a handheld it can be used with or without the two attachments. Another thing I like is that the floor attachment is not as wide as the ones on heavier vacuums, so it can reach narrower places my upright and robot vac can't. I find this very handy.The whole thing stands on its own but doesn't latch into the upright position. The easily released dirt cup has a filter that just lifts out so you can dump the dirt into the trash. The cord is only 15 ft. long which isn't quite long enough for my family room, which is my only little complaint. It wraps neatly on the back of the handle and the plug snaps onto the cord to hold it. Two other minor improvement suggestions would be a place on the handle to store the crevice tool, and a duster tool with bristles, but these aren't dealbreakers.It's extremely simple to put the parts together or take them apart. I immediately used it to vacuum my kitchen and family room (laminate and low pile area rug). I couldn't tell if it was picking anything up as my floor didn't appear dirty (two days since vacuuming), but when I emptied the dirt cup I could see it had done a great job especially on pet hair. It's not very loud which is nice. I believe it has about a 2 amp motor.I'd have preferred the similar $50 version that has a brush roller but chose this simpler one instead, because the one with the brush roller has reviews that say the roller doesn't actually work well.I'll continue to routinely use my beloved Wyze robot vac for my whole house, and occasionally my old Oreck upright if needed, but this little Bissell is wonderful for quick and easy cleanups or when I need a lightweight handheld vac. For hard floors it might be all you need. This little stick vac is a very good value and I recommend it for what is it. I also like that Bissell helps support homeless pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect size for my living quarters and so efficient and light. Love that it turns into a hand vacuum, if needed. I have a sturdier and heavier vacuum but is so cumbersome, I avoid using it. This featherweight is so nice and light and does a great job, in a jiffy. Suction is good for its size and easy to clean filter. Very worthwhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you have hair on your carpet that is caught in the fibers, the vacuum will glaze over it
reviews.reviewText: This was a blind purchase, as in I did little to no research and only read a few reviews.I needed a small vacuum with enough suction power of a regular vacuum to clean my sectional rugs. This guy is it! While the suction power is great, if you have hair on your carpet that is caught in the rug fibers, the vacuum will glaze over it. You will have to pull the hair up yourself and then the vacuum will nab it. Aside from that, its great on hardwood or marble floors and gets dust up quickly. If you have a small apartment and need something powerful, light weight or easy to store, I'd say consider this vacuum! 8/10 for me, I knocked a star off just because the handle clips in and the wheel part slides in like a extender attachment so, the disassembly to use the hand held part is a bit annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lightweight on the market for an amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: This little jewel is a tiny powerhouse! From the price, to a 3 click assembly. to its amazing suction, I am IN LOVE!!! Great pick up on HW and carpet, so agile and light, super easy to empty! One issue is the short, 15' cord. Way too short. I spent $7 at Lowes and bought a 7 foot, black fabric ext. cord. Works perfect and plenty of room to wind it on the handle for storage. I would give it 10 stars if I could!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW, blown away!!
reviews.reviewText: I live in a 1000 sq ft loft apartment and I wanted to get a small vacuum. I did a lot of research on vacuums, went back and forth, finally decided on this one. Mind you all of my floors are hardwood but I just wanted that extra clean satisfaction. I am OCD when it comes to cleaning and have that super clean house. Yea I have Bona swifter that can dust and mop floors which I do both but again I just wanted that extra clean factor. Once opening the box, all parts were included, instructions, and a warranty card to mail in. Super easy to put together which took less than 5 minutes. After putting it together I plug in this fabulous vacuum. It went to work immediately!!! The suction is off the charts, I believe it would suck a sock or two if it could. It really cleaned up my floors of stuff that I didn’t realize was on my floors, I thought I had clean my floor immaculately. It still picked up things here and there. I included a picture of what it clean off my hardwood floors, WOW! The vacuum itself is very lightweight but packs a powerful punch when using it! The color is bright and makes a statement. It’s compact for easy storage. Love this little vacuum!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Great price. I've used it once, it was nice and light and easy to use and now I can vacuum more often without having to pull out the larger, eardrum-shattering, cat-terrifying beast.It worked well enough. The cord is far too short.The cat was still a little afraid but does not seem to be emotionally scarred. Win-win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical on this purchase, but the Bissell name came thru!! I bought this for our camper. Assembly is easy and I was truly amazed at the suction for a $30 vacuum!! It’s lightweight and perfect for this space!! Very Very pleased with this purchase .

Es muy liviana y facil de manipular con un cable largo que alcanza en toda una habitación, incluso para aspirar las orillas de las ventanas, no se batalla con pelos de perro y gato lo aspira al instante 100% recomendada

I’ve had this vacuum for over 8 months now & it’s been great, I use it every week. Perfect for smaller areas, super easy to store. It’s the perfect vacuum for an apartment, it’s not too loud, it’s super lightweight & it vacuums very well for the size of it. I don’t have any carpet flooring so I’m not sure what that would be like with this vacuum, but it’s excellent on hard flooring, it doesn’t leave any scratches. Whenever the time comes that I need to replace the one I have, I’ll definitely be buying another one of these, it’s a super budget friendly option for anyone who can’t spend hundreds of dollars on a vacuum.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very light and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Am happy with the item and work great . Worthy the money , very light and easy to assemble. It is good for small apartments . I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fulfills every promise in the description
reviews.reviewText: The Bissell Featherweight is light and easy to operate. I had to buy a step down transformer to be able to use it. I got the transformer locally and the machine worked well on it. The dust in crevices was sucked up efficiently leaving surfaces clean. I could clean under the bed too, without too much trouble. It has fulfilled all the promises in the other foreign reviews.

Es la mejor compra que he hecho en una aspiradora. Tengo una grande profesional pero terminaba con dolor de espalda, pero esta aspiradora es tan ligera que no sientes el trabajo y tiene una gran potencia para su peso. Se limpia muy fácil el depósito de basura y sin dudarlo lo volvería a comprar. Yo quería algo que limpiara bien sin que terminara muerta de dolor de espalda y es justo lo que conseguí !!
